description: This file defines a Flutter widget named IngredientTile, which displays a single ingredient in a list with a check icon, quantity, and name, styled according to the Ocean theme.

classes.name: IngredientTile
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a list item for an ingredient, showing a check icon, name, and optional quantity.

methods.name: IngredientTile
methods.description: Constructor for the IngredientTile widget, requiring an Ingredient object.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ingredient tile, displaying icon, name, and quantity.
